config.logDebugInfo: Enable/disable logging debug information to the developer console.
config.extensionDescription: Support for configuring and managing a cluster with scale-out SQL Server and big data sources.
config.jupyter.extraKernelsDescription: IDs of the extra kernels to enable
config.jupyter.kernelConfigValuesDescrip: Configuration options for Jupyter kernels. This is automatically managed and not recommended to be manually edited.
connection.host.description: Host or IP Address for the big data endpoint
connection.user.description: Indicates the user ID to be used when connecting through Apache Knox
connection.password.description: Indicates the password to be used when connecting through Apache Knox
connection.clustername.description: The name of the cluster to include in the Knox URl
connection.knoxport.description: Port used for Apache Knox connections
connection.connectTimeout.description: Seconds to wait before timing out when connecting
tab.dataManagementDescription: SQL Server big data cluster tasks
title.openTableFromFileWizard: Create External Table From CSV Files
